nodes.text: The Capital YV-class freighter was a model of medium bulk freighter manufactured as part of the YV series by Corellian Engineering Corperation. Measuring 100 meters in length, its dorsal hatch could be opened to reveal a hangar bay that could carry a single vehicle and it featured an engine system similar to that of a CR90 corvette and a hyperdrive. Equipped with a single quad laser cannon, a Capital YV-class freighter was operated by 2 pilots and could carry up to 6 passengers.

Ellorrs Madak and Baniss Keeg co-owned a Capital YV-class with over a dozen secret cargo holds known as the Millanti, which they used to smuggle bacta to members of the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
